data.title: Addons
data.description: Various addons that can't fit in a specific category:

data.title: volto-quanta
data.description: A new theme for Volto, right now only styles a few form controls

data.title: EEA volto-addons
data.description: (deprecated) Various smaller addons, bunched up in a single package

data.title: volto-embed
data.description: (WIP) GDPR compliant external resource embedding Volto Block

data.title: volto-searchkit
data.description: (WIP) A full ElasticSearch-powered faceted search integrated as a configurable Volto block

data.title: volto-plotlycharts
data.description: (EEA) Powerful chart editor based on Plotly

data.title: volto-block-dataFigure
data.description: (EEA) Volto add-on for Daviz specific SVG charts.

data.title: volto-datablocks
data.description: (EEA) Provides primitives for data connectivity to volto-plotlycharts and other blocks

data.title: volto-form-builder
data.description: A TTW builder of forms

data.title: volto-corsproxy
data.description: A CORS-proxy integrated with Volto, enables access to third-party API servers.

data.title: volto-block-style
data.description: A generic framework to configure block decorations and CSS styles.

data.title: volto-block-toc
data.description: An extensible TOC block alternative to Volto's Table of Contents block.

data.title: volto-matomo
data.description: (WIP) Basic Matomo Tracker integration for Volto

data.title: volto-bookmarks
data.description: Add and manage bookmarks of pages and searchkit queries.

data.title: volto-slate-glossary
data.description: (WIP) Tooltips for glossary terms

data.title: Rich text editing
data.description: Enhance the basic text editing experience

data.title: volto-slate
data.description: (Almost) drop-in replacement for the Volto richtext editor with multiple enhancements

data.title: volto-slate-footnote
data.description: Footnote (and references) plugin for volto-slate.

data.title: volto-slate-metadata-mentions
data.description: Plugin for volto-slate to embed dynamic text that renders Plone metadata fields

data.title: volto-slate-zotero
data.description: Plugin for volto-slate to connect footnotes to Zotero references

data.title: volto-ckeditor
data.description: (deprecated) Simple integration with CKEditor

data.title: volto-slate-dataentity
data.description: Connect text entities in the rich text editor to volto-datablocks connected data

data.title: Layout addons
data.description: Enhancements to the way blocks can be used, to create custom layouts

data.title: volto-subblocks
data.description: A framework to edit and embed blocks into other blocks

data.title: volto-tabs-block
data.description: (wizard-level) Split a Volto page into tabs, complete with editing form integration, using just a simple tabs block.

data.title: volto-mosaic
data.description: (Deprecated) Flexible grid-based implementation of a mosaic layout, complete with responsive layout versions.

data.title: volto-tabsview
data.description: (Deprecated) Extension of volto-mosaic

data.title: volto-gridlayout
data.description: (Deprecated) Supersedes volto-mosaic, another go at providing a flexible full page grid-based mosaic layout

data.title: volto-metadata-block
data.description: Custom Volto Block to insert Plone metadata fields

data.title: volto-accordion-block
data.description: Create group based accordions in blocks.

data.title: volto-grid-block
data.description: Enables grid layout grouping of Volto blocks. It introduces a "grid block" which can be used, from the Edit form, to group other blocks

data.title: volto-columns-block
data.description: Enables grouping Volto blocks as columns

data.title: volto-group-block
data.description: Group blocks in sections and filter available blocks per content-type per section

data.title: volto-blocks-grid
data.description: Unidimensional (x-axis) grids for blocks

data.title: Widgets
data.description: Input components, to be reused in the form library

data.title: volto-object-widget
data.description: Widget for generic JS objects

data.title: volto-widget-geolocation
data.description: Geolocation with

data.title: volto-widget-temporal-coverage
data.description: (EEA) Volto widget: Temporal coverage.

data.title: volto-widgets-view
data.description: Provides the "view" counterpart for the "edit" widgets in Volto

data.title: volto-widget-toggle
data.description: Replace checkbox widgets with a visually nicer toggle widget
